name: prettier-sql-vscode
description: VSCode Extension to format SQL files

scripts.build:prod: yarn run build --minify && yarn run compile:types
scripts.build:dev: yarn run build --sourcemap && yarn run compile:types
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint

Prettier-SQL.SQLFlavourOverride.markdownDescription: Formats `sql` files in another SQL Flavour when no VSCode Language exists, such as the Microsoft PostgreSQL & MSSQL Extensions

Prettier-SQL.ignoreTabSettings.markdownDescription: Ignore user and workplace settings for `tabSize` and `insertSpaces` (uses `#Prettier-SQL.tabSizeOverride#` and `#Prettier-SQL.insertSpacesOverride#`)?

Prettier-SQL.uppercaseKeywords.markdownDescription: Whether to print keywords in ALL CAPS or lowercase

enumDescriptions: Standard SQL format, with cascading indents
Maintain space column between keyword and args, aligning keywords to left
Maintain space column between keyword and args, aligning keywords to right

Prettier-SQL.breakBeforeBooleanOperator.markdownDescription: Whether to break before or after AND and OR

enumDescriptions: Use AS in SELECT clauses and for tables
Use AS only in SELECT clauses
Do not use AS for aliases
Prettier-SQL.aliasAS.markdownDescription: Where to use AS in column or table aliases

Prettier-SQL.tabulateAlias.markdownDescription: Whether to right-align aliases to the longest line in the SELECT clause

enumDescriptions: Comma right-aligned to longest column line
Prettier-SQL.commaPosition.markdownDescription: Where to place commas for SELECT and GROUP BY clauses

markdownEnumDescriptions: Always break keywords items onto a newline
Break onto newline when line width > `#Prettier-SQL.lineWidth#`
Break onto newline when item count > `#Prettier-SQL.itemCount#`
Place all selected columns on the same line as keyword
Prettier-SQL.keywordNewline.newlineMode.markdownDescription: Rule for when to break keyword clauses onto a newline

Prettier-SQL.keywordNewline.itemCount.markdownDescription: Breaks keywords clauses onto newline after n items when `#Prettier-SQL.keywordNewline#` is set to itemCount

Prettier-SQL.parenOptions.openParenNewli.markdownDescription: Place (, Open Paren, CASE on newline when creating a new block

Prettier-SQL.parenOptions.closeParenNewl.markdownDescription: Place ), Close Paren, END on newline when closing a block

Prettier-SQL.lineWidth.markdownDescription: Number of characters allowed in each line before breaking

Prettier-SQL.linesBetweenQueries.markdownDescription: How many newlines to place between each query / statement

Prettier-SQL.denseOperators.markdownDescription: Strip whitespace around operators such as + or >=

Prettier-SQL.semicolonNewline.markdownDescription: Whether to place semicolon on its own line or on previous line
